title: Help
description: Click Me to find out more :)

Notes.title: Welcome to TapNotes
Notes.description: Thank your for downloading our app!!!

Notes.title: Notes
Notes.description: This is where all of your notes will be displayed

Notes.title: Delete Categories
Notes.description: To delete categories you just press the 3 dots in the corner :)

Notes.title: Delete Notes
Notes.description: Just click the X attached to the card

Notes.title: Create Notes
Notes.description: Select Notes in the menu, It is the first in the list

Notes.title: Create Categories
Notes.description: Select 'Create new category' in the menu, It is the third in the list
